1.content:
Sirens were wailing as ambulances were as people were crowding around the body of a teenage girl lied there in the streets.

"What...happened? Where...am I?" she wondered as she looked around to see a car with a dented in fender and lots of blood on the ground. "Blood? What in the...is this...mine?" she wondered.

She blacked out for a moment before awaking a moment later in a hospital room, hooked up to lots of life support as she saw a couple crying over her. "Mom? And Dad? They seem...so sad. And...I feel so sleepy." she said as her eyes were slowly closing. "Guess...this is it. I die...here and now." she said as her eyes closed completely.

All she could see was total darkness left and right. 'Wow. So this is what its like to be dead. It feels...like I'm nothing. Guess this is...huh?" she wondered as she saw a white light ahead. "A white light? I'm I...going to heaven?" she asked as the light over took her.


Now, which creature will our young protagonist be reincarnated as and be sure to choose wisely.
1.title: Entering A New Life

11.content: Here is the first set of creatures you can select for her. Pick from the five.
11.title: Creature Set 1

112.content:
Alice began to awake as saw herself in a dark and dank place.

"Ugh, where am I? Why can't I speak?" she wondered before she saw a canal of water as she looked inside of it. She saw now a formless blood with eyes and moved back in terror. "What? I'm a blob?"

She looked around as she saw herself inside of a sewer. "Ugh, I'm in the sewers? Gross." she thought. "Let's see...where can I...." she thought before seeing a pipe leading up. "Perfect!" she said moving over to the pipe as she squeezed herself into it as she travelled up the pipe.

After what seemed like hours, she found herself plopping into a sink. "Phew. What a workout." she thought as she looked around to see herself...
112.title: A Slimy Start

114.content:
"Huh? Where...where am I? And...why do I feel wet? Wait...my entire body feels..." she said before opening her eyes. She found herself in some sort of makeshift home built into a reef. She saw that her body was mostly normal except for one thing, her legs were missing and had been replaced with a fish like lower body with scales that seemed to shine a beautiful rainbow color.

"Aw...finally awake little one." said a older looking woman who was holding her.

"She's got your eyes, minnow." said an older looking man who looked down on her with joy,

"I think...they're my parents. Then...that would make me their daughter. And...looks like...I'M A MERMAID!" she thought. "My god! This is every girls fantasy to be a mermaid ever since they're little girls. On top of they, they actually exist!" she said as she swam about a bit.

"She seems so excited on her first day of life." the woman said.

"Indeed. She's going to grow up to become a find young mermaid of our people." the man said.

What point in her life will we look at?
114.title: Under the Sea

12.content: Our second set of creatures you can choose from. Choose Wisely from the five.
12.title: Creature Set 2

125.content:
When the light subsided, she found herself looked at a grass roof above her head. "Huh? Where am I?" she wondered as a figure looked down at her. It was a tall woman with pointed ears and green hair.

"You are certainly beautiful. Welcome to the world, little one." she said. "I'm your mother?"

"My mother?" she tried to say before found nothing coming out. "Wait, I can't..." she said before she saw a reflection in a bowl of water. There she saw a baby in the womans arms. She had pointed ears like her and a small tuft of green hair. She then realized she was the baby. "That's...me. I'm...an elf."

She then looked up to the woman as she held her close.

"And this is my new mother. I've been given another chance at life. No one would ever believe this. But...maybe I could get used to this." she pondered.

We then skip ahead to...
125.title: An Elf is born

13.content: This is a set of Undead Creatures that she could possibly reincarnate as. Pick your poison.
13.title: Undead Creature Set

choices: an old time village some time in the past
a modern day city just below the hills
a complete barren land devoid of life
131.content:
"Ugh...what...what happened? Where am I?" she groaned before finding herself in a strange box of sorts. "Am I in a box?" she said before finding herself easily breaking out.

She looked around to find herself in a strange stone castle of sorts as she looked around curiously. "Where am I? Last I remember I thought I was dying right in the street. Is this the afterlife?" she pondered before holding a hand over her heart. "Guess so. I can't feel my pulse and my heart doesn't feel like its beating. I guess I really am dead as a doornail."

She wandered the halls of the castle for awhile, finding it completely empty. "Gonna be honest, doesn't really look like how I imagined heaven to be like. Or maybe I'm in hell." she said before noticing something. In a mirror by the staircase, she noticed that while her clothes appeared, her actual body was not visible at all. "Oh god." she said before moving her tongue around her teeth to find two fangs. "Oh god...I'm not in the afterlife...somehow I've been reincarnated as a vampire." she said before rushing to the window and looking out it. It was night of course but she was surprised to look out at...
131.title: Life as a Bloodsucker

choices: She goes to search for more victims
Tries to keep her urges in check and explore
Ends up getting a job somewhere seedy
1312.content:
She saw a modern day city just below the hills that seemed to be flowing with lights and many different sounds as she found herself heading right into it. Though she found the lights a little too bright as she shielded her eyes.

"Okay. Forgot. Vampires are sensitive to some lights." she said as she found herself stumbling down the hill and crashing into a nearby alleyway. She groaned as she got up before seeing some drunkard standing over her.

"Hey...can't hold your booze?" they asked with a slur.

"No no. I just...just..." Alice said before noticing she could actually see the veins and heart of this man as she licked her fangs. "Maybe...I could use a drink." she said before lunging at him and biting into his neck. She started sucking his blood for a bit before letting him fall unconscious. "Oh man...who knew blood tasted so good." she said noticing her skin was less pale. "Seems blood makes you look less like a vampire." she said before hiding the guy under some trash. "Now what to do in the big city?" she pondered.
1312.title: Modern Day Vampire

14.content: A set containing creatures that can shift between a bestial and humanoid form. Choose wisely.
14.title: Shifter Set

choices: To live life as a normal human
To wage war against humanity with her fellow spirits
To encourage others to worship the spirits of Japan once more
143.content:
"Hmm?" Alice pondered as she awoke inside of a small wooden room. "Where am I?" she asked herself before finding herself on all fours. She approached a nearby mirror and found she was looking more animal than human. She stood there as a small white furred fox with strange red markings on her face. "I'm...a fox?" she asked. "This must be reincarnation." she realized before looking to the door. She walked over to it and slowly pushed it open.

Once she was outside, she found the room was actually the inside of a small Japanese shrine of sorts, abandoned and deep within a forest. "I live in a shrine?" she pondered. "Hmm...there is one thing I have always wondered." she said before leaping into the air and spinning as blue flames surrounded her before she stood there as a human girl with fox ears and a tail. "I knew it. I'm a Kitsune. A Japanese fox spirit." she said before realizing she was naked. "I might need to practice with my disguises." she said covering herself before creating a kimono for her to wear.

She then went back into the shrine and considered her next move. It was then clear to her...with her new life...she had decided.
143.title: With a Foxy New Attitude

1431.content:
"Hmm. Maybe this is a chance to pick up where my old life left off." she said. "I may be some fox spirit but it appears I can create illusions, transform, even perform feats others might call magic. But...I do want to live. So...I'll live on here. First through...I need to relearn a few things." she said.

She spent those months relearning how to read and write in both English and Japanese so that if any situation were to come up, she would be prepared. She even managed to learn how to maintain her illusions up to a full day. After all this was said and done, she had approached another dielimma...what sort of life she was going to live. She was faced with several choices. On one hand, she should pretend to be a student in order to obtain an education, one another choice was to become a music star and gain fame and fortune. And the last would be to become a politician and work her way up to become a ruler of the country. She spent the entire knight thinking her choices over before she came to a decision.
1431.title: A Fox in Human Skin

15.content: More Creature sets for you!
15.title: More Sets

151.content: Welcome to set 5, so be sure to look alive. You're choices.
151.title: Creature Set 5

152.content: Here is set 6 of our many creature sets. Enjoy your pick.
152.title: Creature Set 6

153.content: Okay, this is creature set seven so I hope you all aren't too bored out there.
153.title: Creature Set 7

1533.content:
Slowly but surely, Alice opened her eyes. She was looking up, and saw her ceiling. Somehow, she had ended up right back in her home, and was now in her pajamas. This completely confused her.

Sitting up quickly, she brought on her hands to her face... and saw that it was covered in green scales. Surprised, she looked at her other hand, and saw the same thing: green scales and small claws.

Jumping out of bed, she ran out of her room and into the bathroom, and looked in the mirror. Sure enough, her entire body was now covered in green scales. Her face was still human, but just scaly. Her eyes, however, had turned yellow with black slits for pupils. Her teeth had turned sharp. Her previously blonde hair was gone now. Behind her, a long tail poked out. She stuck out her tongue, and got a lizard tongue.

"OK, so I've turned into a lizard thing." Alice said to herself, trying not to panic. "Think, what happened last night... I was coming back home with my parents, I tripped on the curb, somthing hit me... a car! I saw a light... did I come back to life? If so, why am I a lizard creature?"

Her musing was interrupted by the bathroom door opening. Turning, she saw her mother. Her mother stared at Alice for a moment before...
1533.title: Lizard Alice

154.content: Okay. Set 8 and I am feelin' great. Let's see if we can keep it going.
154.title: Creature Set 8

info.brief_description: A girl has died but has been given the chance to be reincarnated but not in the same form.
info.description:
You are a girl in your teens named Alice and you have recently died in an accident, but has been given the chance to come back as something new, but not as the same species she once was. Now she will live her new life in the form she has been reincarnated as.

Rules

Killing is allowed but not for Alice.

No gore(blood is acceptable)

No reincarnating into a man, female only.

No sex but sexual themes are allowed.

That is all, so enjoy.
